The Time of Misfortune Is Not Known. Again I saw under the sun that the race is not won by the swift, nor the battle by the valiant, nor a livelihood by the wise, nor riches by the shrewd, nor favor by the experts; for a time of misfortune comes to all alike.

Restoration of the People - As for you, by the blood of your covenant, I have freed your prisoners from a waterless pit.
